casebody.data:
REXNORD CORPORATION, et al.
v.
SUN DRAINAGE PRODUCTS, LLC, et al. 157A17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 17, 2017 Benjamin P. Fryer, Sarah H. Negus, Attorneys at Law, Charlotte, E. Taylor Stukes, Attorney at Law, for Rexnord Corporation, et al. William S. Cherry, III, J. Whitfield Gibson, Attorneys at Law, Raleigh, for Sun Drainage Products, LLC. Thomas C. Kilpatrick, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Bauer, James R.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th of August 2017 Joint motion:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of August 2017."
